mapper.select: SELECT A.custcd, A.spjangcd, A.rptdate, A.perid, ISNULL(r.pernm, j.pernm) as pernm, A.rptnum, A.cltcd, a.actcd, a.actnm, a.equpcd, m.equpnm, a.carcd, r.carnum, r.model, A.wkcd, t.businm AS wktext, A.frtime, A.totime, isnull(A.km,0) as km , A.remark, A.startkm, A.endkm, convert(numeric, dbo.df_nm_rtn1('tb_e037_km', a.custcd, a.perid, a.rptdate, '')) as monkm, convert(numeric, dbo.df_nm_rtn1('tb_e411_daycount', a.custcd, a.perid, a.rptdate, '')) as daycount, convert(numeric, dbo.df_nm_rtn1('tb_e411_moncount', a.custcd, a.perid, a.rptdate, '')) as compcount FROM TB_E038 A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e047 r WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = r.custcd AND a.spjangcd = r.spjangcd AND a.carcd = r.carcd) INNER JOIN TB_JA001 j WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = j.custcd AND a.spjangcd = j.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(j.perid, CHARINDEX('p', j.perid)+1, LEN(j.perid))) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e021 t WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = t.custcd AND a.spjangcd = t.spjangcd AND a.wkcd = t.busicd) WHERE A.custcd = #{custcd} AND A.spjangcd = #{spjangcd} AND A.rptdate like concat('%',#{rptdate},'%') AND A.perid like concat('%',#{perid},'%') order by a.rptdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into TB_E038 (rptdate, custcd, spjangcd, rptnum, actcd, equpcd, carcd, frtime, totime, remark, perid)values (#{rptdate}, #{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{rptnum}, #{actcd}, #{equpcd}, #{carcd}, #{frtime}, #{totime}, #{remark}, #{perid})
mapper.delete: delete from tb_e038 where rptdate = #{rptdate} and perid = #{perid} and actcd = #{actcd} and equpcd = #{equpcd} and carcd = #{carcd}
mapper.select: select * from tb_e601 where actnm like concat('%',#{actnm},'%')
select a.cltcd, (select actnm from tb_e601 where actcd = a.actcd) as actnm, a.actcd, a.equpcd, a.equpnm from tb_e611 a where a.actcd = #{actcd}
select * from tb_e047 where carnum like concat('%',#{carnum},'%')
select max(rptnum) from TB_E038 where Left(rptnum,6) = #{rptnum}
